downloadDescription: The ConferenceXP research platform enables researchers and developers to create distributed applications that take advantage of ConferenceXP technology, as well as Tablet PCs and wireless networks. Last published: January 8, 2007.
detailsSection: The ConferenceXP research platform enables researchers and developers to create distributed applications that take advantage of ConferenceXP technology, as well as Tablet PCs and wireless networks. The platform also enables users to develop the collaborative tools and applications they need without having to build them from scratch. By partnering with research organizations and universities, the ConferenceXP project combines the academic community’s expertise in the learning sciences with Microsoft’s expertise in technology.
